scripts.watch: yarn run clean && tsc --watch & tsc-alias --watch --silent & nodemon --quiet --ext ts --watch src --exec 'yarn run --silent lint'
scripts.build: yarn run clean && yarn run lint && tsc && tsc-alias
scripts.release: yarn run build && yarn run movePackageJson && cd out && yarn publish --access public --non-interactive
scripts.movePackageJson: cat ./package.json | json -e 'delete this.scripts; delete this.devDependencies; delete this.postinstall' > ./out/package.json
